title.narrative: PDF - Policy Development Facility - Procurement of Services

description.narrative: This activity (PDF - Policy Development Facility - Procurement of Services) is a component of Policy Development Facility Programme (PDF) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £13,165,466. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management, Research/scientific institutions. , with the following implementing partners: Baker Tilly Nigeria, DAI Europe, The Policy Practice . The start date is 01-02-2010 and the end date is 26-05-2015.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management

description.narrative: Executive - General Public Service - Executive - executive
